public.about.mission.value: Our mission is to make professionals work worthwhile

public.about.story-1.value: When we were in our previous jobs, we realized that in almost all the topics we were carrying, it was usual to ask for information, it being usual for customers to take a long time to send the information we needed to work.

public.about.story-2.value: That information we requested was essential to start working.

public.about.story-3.value: When asking other professionals, many agreed that this same situation often happened to them. It did not matter if at the time of requesting the information we left it beautiful and easily understood, customers rarely responded to the email with all the information.

public.about.story-4.value: It was common for customers to send the information with an eyedropper or forget to send certain documents. This forced us to constantly chase customers so that we could have all the information.

public.about.story-5.value: We began to investigate what tools in the market could solve that situation and not seeing any tool that solved it well and in a simple way we decided to solve it ourselves.

public.about.story-6.value: At that time Parallel was born.

public.about.tech-company.value: Parallel is a technology company that builds the next generation tools for professionals daily tasks.

public.security.data-at-rest.value: Your data at rest is encrypted using the 256-bit AES-256 (Advanced Encryption Standard).

public.security.hero-title.value: Your information is safe with Parallel

public.security.how-we-protect.value: How do we protect your data and information?

public.security.pass-storage.value: We will never store your passwords as you type them, you can only reset them by means that allow us to verify your credentials.

public.security.pillar.value: At Parallel we maintain security as one of our fundamental pillars. We know that trust is the foundation of any relationship. So we protect you and the people with whom you interact.

public.security.protect-your-customer.value: How do we protect your clients' information?

public.security.secure-access.value: You can safely access your files from any computer, and all communications and requests for information will be kept safe from third parties.

public.security.ssl-connection.value: We use SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) to protect data in transit between the Parallel application in your browser and our servers.

public.security.system-security-layers.value: For this, our system has multiple layers of protection and is secure by design.

public.security.trust-our-security.value: Trust Parallel to keep all your information safe and confidential.

public.security.verify-identity.value: In addition, no one will be able to access upload pages to download or view information without first identifying themselves.

public.security.your-connection.value: How do we protect your connection?

public.steps.client-timings.value: We automate the information request process. Your client will not know that it is not you who sends the emails.

public.steps.focus-on-work.value: We will send reminders to your client so you don't have to worry about a thing. When everything is ready, you will receive a notification.

public.steps.receive-inbox.value: Receive it on time in your inbox

public.steps.user-friendly.value: Use our friendly and easy to use interface. Tell us what documentation you need and who has to send it to you.
